course_description: This course focuses on elementary communication skills through a systematic introduction to the basic grammatical patterns and vocabulary of the Italian language. The goal is to widen the fundamental skills of listening comprehension, speaking, reading and writing within a cultural context.
sections: Class Nbr: 1478, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10:15a-12:15p, Instructor: A. Di Pietro, Status: Open
